text: Dear, venerable goddess! I've been following your warnings on time. But I didn't get to tie the mast when we saw the island of the mermaids, because I was determined to get lost. In the middle of the silent sea was the fatal meadow. It looked like a shipment of violet wandering through the waters. Dear, noble goddess of beautiful hair! My fate is cruel. As I was determined to lose myself, the sirens did not sing for me. Fin of 1917
title: A Circe
author: Julio Torri
